headline: Why Everest Group (EG) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of global reinsurance company Everest Group (NYSE:EG) fell 9.7% in the afternoon session after it reported disappointing third-quarter 2025 results that fell short of Wall Street's expectations on several key metrics.

raw.headline: Why Everest Group (EG) Shares Are Plunging Today
raw.summary: Shares of global reinsurance company Everest Group (NYSE:EG) fell 9.7% in the afternoon session after it reported disappointing third-quarter 2025 results that fell short of Wall Street's expectations on several key metrics.

headline: Everest to divest retail commercial insurance renewal rights to AIG
summary: The transaction will see AIG gaining the rights to renew Everest’s US, UK, European and Asia-Pacific Commercial Retail businesses.

headline: What's in Store for These 3 Insurance Stocks in Q3 Earnings?

headline: How Recent Analyst Moves Are Rewriting the Story for Everest Group
summary: Everest Group’s stock price target has inched higher, with the fair value estimate now set at $390.87 per share, up slightly from $390.20. This revised target comes amid a steady flow of analyst updates following a solid third quarter for the insurer. Stay tuned to discover how investors can keep track of evolving analyst perspectives and future changes to Everest Group's valuation narrative. What Wall Street Has Been Saying ? Bullish Takeaways BofA analyst Joshua Shanker raised the price...

headline: KellyOCG Named MSP and Services Procurement Leader by Everest Group
summary: Business also recognized as a Star Performer on Services Procurement/SOW PEAK Matrix®TROY, Mich., Oct. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- KellyOCG®, the outsourcing and consulting group of specialty talent solutions provider Kelly® (Nasdaq: KELYA, KELYB), has been named a Leader on Everest Group’s 2025 PEAK Matrix® for both Contingent Workforce Management (CWM) / Managed Service Provider (MSP) and Services Procurement / Statement of Work (SOW).
